Power_Bolt.help: You launch a quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target down.
Power_Bolt.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Power_Blast.help: You launch a focused blast of energy at a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target back.
Power_Blast.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Energy_Torrent.help: You launch a cone of energy which can hit several targets. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock any affected target back.
Energy_Torrent.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

Power_Burst.help: You launch a massive burst of energy focused on a single foe. This causes smashing and energy damage. It will also occasionally knock the target back.
Power_Burst.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

Aim.help: You increase your damage potential and chance to hit for a few seconds.

Explosive_Blast.help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets back.
Explosive_Blast.shortHelp: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

Nova.help: You create a tremendous blast of energy around yourself, sending nearby foes flying. This blast does smashing and energy damage.
